author: Jagdeep Kaur
text: The waves in the ocean teach us such a big lesson. As soon as one wave finishes, the other one has already followed. So never give up, keep going on and on and you'll reach your destination 👌 https://t.co/PjMx4ezOq1

author: Jagdeep Kaur
text: Listen to understand, not to respond.

author: Jagdeep Kaur
text: Courage is also when you decide to keep silent to save the relationships.

author: Jagdeep Kaur
text: Sometimes, the day we feel very enthusiastic and motivated, we may set up many goals for us. And, then we find difficult to follow them. Hence, set one achievable goal at a time and follow it, with full energy. 🙂🙏👍 https://t.co/ULgUDPsJgj

author: Jagdeep Kaur
text: Maturity doesn't come with age, as much as it comes with the responsibilities you're handling. https://t.co/gC79qecuHn
